dishes.name: Lamb Tzatziki Burgers
dishes.description: A delicious burger with all the fixings.

dishes.name: Chicken Marengo
dishes.description: A French dish consisting of a chicken saut√©ed in oil with garlic and tomato, garnished with fried eggs and crayfish.

dishes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
dishes.description: Delicious spaghetti with a creamy carbonara sauce.

dishes.name: Chicken Quinoa Salad
dishes.description: A fresh and healthy quinoa salad with a variety of vegetables.

dishes.name: Pizza Margherita
dishes.description: A classic pizza margherita with fresh basil and mozzarella cheese.

dishes.name: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
dishes.description: A tasty falafel wrap with tahini sauce and fresh vegetables.

dishes.name: Chicken Handi
dishes.description: A must-try dish for Indian curry lovers. Aromatic, tender boneless chicken pieces cooked in creamy curry sauce.

dishes.name: Sushi
dishes.description: A variety of vegan sushi rolls with fresh vegetables and tofu.

dishes.name: Spicy Arrabiata Penne
dishes.description: Fresh flavors mixed in with it, the fresh parsley, basil and parmesan.

dishes.name: Crock Pot Chicken Baked Tacos
dishes.description: Easy shredded chicken is combined with cheese, layered in a tortilla and baked to perfection.

dishes.name: Pork Cassoulet
dishes.description: traditional French bean stew with pork, duck confit, and sausage.

dishes.name: Tonkatsu pork
dishes.description: Tonkatsu is a popular Japanese dish where the pork is coated in flour, beaten eggs, and panko breadcrumbs and deep fried in oil.

dishes.name: Braised Beef Chilli
dishes.description: Ancho chilli, dark chocolate and paprika add wonderful flavours to this slow-cooked beef chilli. Serve with fresh bean salsa for an impressive one-pot dish.

dishes.name: Cajun spiced fish tacos
dishes.description: Delicious smoky seared Cajun fish with rich creamy avocado cilantro sauce & spicy tangy pico de gallo all wrapped in warm tortilla.

dishes.name: Recheado Masala Fish
dishes.description: The fish is slit and stuffed with amazing tangy, spicy recheado masala, then coated with rava and shallow fried until golden brown and crispy.

dishes.name: Fish Stew with Rouille
dishes.description: Served with rouille, a red, mayonnaise-like sauce, this robust seafood stew will transport you to the French port city of Marseille

dishes.name: Lamb Rogan josh
dishes.description: An Indian lamb curry with a heady combination of intense spices in a creamy tomato curry sauce.

dishes.name: Stuffed Lamb Tomatoes
dishes.description: Tomatoes filled with delicious Mediterranean lamb flavoured with olives, lemon and herbs.

dishes.name: Honey Teriyaki Salmon
dishes.description: This honey teriyaki salmon is moist, juicy, with a sticky sweet and savory honey teriyaki glaze

dishes.name: Salmon Prawn Risotto
dishes.description: An easy hot smoked salmon and prawn risotto flavoured with lemon and parsley.
